The 2025–26 season is the Bashundhara Kings's 13th competitive professional season since its creation in 2013, and 8th consecutive season in Bangladesh Premier League, country's top-tier football league. In addition to the domestic league, Bashundhara Kings is participating in this season's edition of AFC Challenge League, Federation Cup, Independence Cup and Challenge Cup also Super Cup.
Players
Players and squad numbers last updated on 15 August 2025. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules. Players may hold more than one non-FIFA nationality.
